forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 9C. Winds N at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then clearing with ample sunshine by the afternoon. High 49F. Winds N at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A clear sky. Low 2C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 35F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 49F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 49F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain tapering to a few showers late. Low 37F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 51F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 39F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy early, then afternoon sunshine. High near 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 39F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 41F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 58F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.
